item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. "Sneakers" film released in 4k, struck from original camera negative (69 points | 10 comments)
2. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (62 points | 16 comments)
3. Faster sorting with SIMD CUDA intrinsics (2024) (41 points | 4 comments)
4. Evolving OpenAI's Structure (496 points | 531 comments)
5. Why does Switzerland have so many bunkers? (42 points | 30 comments)
6. Understanding Memory Management, Part 5: Fighting with Rust (66 points | 8 comments)
7. Show HN: Real-time AI Voice Chat at ~500ms Latency (334 points | 135 comments)
8. Critical CSS (51 points | 19 comments)
9. Replacing Kubernetes with systemd (2024) (248 points | 131 comments)
10. Analyzing Modern Nvidia GPU Cores (111 points | 10 comments)
11. “An independent journalist” who won't remain nameless (173 points | 63 comments)
12. Possibly a Serious Possibility (207 points | 92 comments)
13. Pixels in Islamic art: square Kufic calligraphy (12 points | 1 comment)
14. Technical analysis of the Signal clone used by Trump officials (641 points | 264 comments)
15. Databricks in talks to acquire startup Neon for about $1B (150 points | 96 comments)
16. Can you smuggle data in an ID card photo? (22 points | 3 comments)

18. Google has most of my email because it has all of yours (2014) (146 points | 99 comments)
19. An Interactive Debugger for Rust Trait Errors (5 points | discuss)
20. How are cyber criminals rolling in 2025? (217 points | 71 comments)
21. How Kim Jong Il Kidnapped a Director, Made a Cult Hit Godzilla Knockoff (2015) (61 points | 21 comments)
22. The Beauty of Having a Pi-Hole (2024) (234 points | 160 comments)
23. I decided to pay off a school’s lunch debt (328 points | 363 comments)
24. Catastrophic fires and soil degradation: possible link with Neolithic revolution (6 points | discuss)
25. Show HN: TextQuery – Query CSV, JSON, XLSX Files with SQL (135 points | 50 comments)
26. As an experienced LLM user, I don't use generative LLMs often (307 points | 159 comments)
27. The vocal effects of Daft Punk (394 points | 100 comments)
28. Dimension 126 Contains Twisted Shapes, Mathematicians Prove (117 points | 64 comments)
29. Show HN: Tkintergalactic - Declarative Tcl/Tk UI Library for Python (76 points | 9 comments)
30. The Death of Daydreaming (585 points | 223 comments)
